text:
Mayank Shukla
Infosys group as a Test Analyst - Infosys Ltd/Edgeverve Systems Ltd

Bengaluru, Karnataka - Email me on Indeed: indeed.com/r/Mayank-Shukla/3c6042bd141ad353

Waterfall methodology etc.
❖ Knowledge of project management tools like IBM CLM.
❖ Received "Award of Excellence" from Tricentis for Automation testing using TOSCA.

Infosys group as a Test Analyst

January 2015 to Present

ary 2015 and got promoted to Test Analyst. Originally started with Infosys Ltd and currently
working in Infosys's products subsidiary Edgeverve Systems Ltd for Infosys Finacle.
❖ Performing automation testing using agile methodology for projects like Finacle Core Banking
Solution and Finacle CRM Solution.
❖ Worked on automation testing using Selenium and TOSCA.
❖ Worked for Agile Release Train (ART) in Scaled Agile Framework using IBM RCLM tool.
❖ Working closely with Developers in Scrum Based software development model to prepare test
plans based upon testing scope.
❖ Conducting functional, regression and end to end testing using IBM Rational Quality Manager
cross platforms using various APIs.
❖ Experience in Web services testing and RESTful API testing.
❖ Worked on distributed execution technique for Automation Testing using Jenkins.
❖ Experience in Oracle Database, SQL queries, SQL Loader, SQL Plus
❖ Involved in performance testing using batch processing on UNIX server.
❖ Involved in defect logging, tracking and reporting using IBM Change and Configuration
Management (CCM) application on Jazz platform.
❖ Worked on live project for Finacle Core Banking solution to provide Beta Quality Certifications
for the enhancements on the running solution.
